columns.name: AGENT_GID
columns.description: The agent holding the action whose statistics are being collected.

columns.name: ACTION_FLOW
columns.description: The agent block holding the action whose statistics are being collected.

columns.name: ACTION_SEQUENCE
columns.description: The action sequence number of the action whose statistics are being collected. Note that (AGENT_GID, ACTION_FLOW, ACTION_SEQUENCE) define a distinct action in AGENT_ACTION_DETAILS to track.

columns.name: AGENT_ACTION_GID
columns.description: The agent action being tracked. Note this is for search purposes and does not uniquely define the action within its agent.

columns.name: NUM_WAITS
columns.description: Total number of times the action was published.

columns.name: TOTAL_WAIT_TIME
columns.description: Total time (in seconds) the action waited in the mediator or an event queue.

columns.name: AVG_WAIT_TIME
columns.description: Average time (in seconds) the action waited in the mediator or an event queue.

columns.name: MAX_WAIT_TIME
columns.description: Maximum time (in seconds) the action waited in the mediator or an event queue.

columns.name: NUM_EXECS
columns.description: Total number of times the action was executed.

columns.name: TOTAL_EXEC_TIME
columns.description: Total execution time (in seconds) for the action. This is measured from the time the action begins execution to the time it terminates on that thread. I.e., it does not include time for child processes to complete.

columns.name: AVG_EXEC_TIME
columns.description: Average execution time (in seconds) for the action. This is measured from the time the action begins execution to the time it terminates on that thread. I.e., it does not include time for child processes to complete.

columns.name: MAX_EXEC_TIME
columns.description: Maximum execution time (in seconds) for the action. This is measured from the time the action begins execution to the time it terminates on that thread. I.e., it does not include time for child processes to complete.

columns.name: NUM_RUNS
columns.description: Total number of times the action was completed.

columns.name: TOTAL_RUN_TIME
columns.description: Total run time of the action. This is measured from when the action is published to the time it's process is completed. It includes the time to process any work triggered by the action.

columns.name: AVG_RUN_TIME
columns.description: Average run time of the action. This is measured from when the action is published to the time it's process is completed. It includes the time to process any work triggered by the action.

columns.name: MAX_RUN_TIME
columns.description: Maximum run time of the action. This is measured from when the action is published to the time it's process is completed. It includes the time to process any work triggered by the action.

columns.name: SINCE
columns.description: The last reset time for statistics collection. Note that all statistics are reset any time the action's agent is modified.
